item.title: Please look at this how i get npcs to talk
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

okay so here i think is what i want but i dont know what i do to make it talk can you tell me

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 86) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomrat(),
npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
